name: The Cellar (itch) (PippaPixel)
description:
Be a big brave boy/girl and explore the cellar for your mum!  

Solve puzzles, outsmart mice and drink suspicious things in the hope of finding the legendary cellar treasure.

WASD to move.

Space to interact with things or move to the next text in a conversation.

I to open your inventory.

E to examine an inventory object more closely.

Tab to move between inventories.

ESC to quit out of things.
